definitions.definition: A yellowish-flowered Mediterranean herb of the mustard family with flavoured leaves, often eaten in salads , that has a distinct, peppery flavor, of three species:

subdefinitions.definition: Eruca spp., especially Eruca sativa (syn. Eruca vesicaria subsp. sativa )
